inputs.topic_discovery_motivation: Article discusses historical and political themes related to Russia, which may connect to existing geopolitical nodes.

category.motivation: The article discusses the historical geopolitical context of the Soviet era, highlighting the gulag system and its impact on theater practitioners, which falls under geopolitical events.

article_node.title: Qué significa gulag
article_node.summary: The word of the day is 'gulag,' referring to a 20th-century system of Russian labor camps for political prisoners. It has appeared in 43 articles on NYTimes.com over the past year, including a piece about actor Jon Bernthal's experiences in Moscow. The article highlights the dangers faced by theater practitioners during the Soviet era, where risking imprisonment and gulag was a reality.
